channel.title: Data Engineering on Sarbhanu Baidya
channel.description: Recent content in Data Engineering on Sarbhanu Baidya

item.title: BBC Reader
item.description:
Deployment:

View on Render (Might take ~1 minute to load.)

BBC Reader is a web-app that is built around a highly fluid MongoDB Cluster which is being updated by an automated data scraper storing scraped news metadata to cluster instances times a day, making it highly available for any kind of analytics on the go. The web-app here is a demonstration of that.

item.title: Four years of Blue Bikes
item.description:
Dashboard:

View with Tableau Public

Blue Bikes (formerly, Hubway) is owned by the municipalities of Boston, Brookline, Cambridge and Somerville, and operated by Motivate International, Inc in Boston, MA.
